entry.title: AGU 2024 Presentation Details
entry.content:
Below are the details for my upcoming AGU presentation. Hope to see you there!

Final Abstract Number & Title: A34D-07: A CCN Closure Study over the Northwest Atlantic: Applying Köhler Theory and Machine Learning Techniques to the NASA ACTIVATE Dataset
Presentation Type: Oral
Session Number & Title: A34D: Boundary Layer Clouds and Climate Change II Oral
Date & Time: Wednesday, 11 December 2024, 16:00 – 17:30 EST
Presentation Length: 17:00 – 17:10 EST
Location: Convention Center, 202 A
entry.summary: Below are the details for my upcoming AGU presentation. Hope to see you there!
